mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ts_menu ( PARENT_ID, ICON_CLS, PIC_URL, MENU_PATH, MLEVEL, MNAME, URL, DE_CODE, MENU_SORT, SYS_MENU, AVALIABLE, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DELETE_MARK ) VALUES ( #{parentId}, #{iconCls}, #{picUrl}, #{menuPath}, #{mlevel}, #{mname}, #{url}, #{deCode}, #{menuSort}, #{sysMenu}, #{avaliable}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{deleteMark} )
mapper.update: update ts_menu set PARENT_ID=#{parentId}, ICON_CLS=#{iconCls}, PIC_URL=#{picUrl}, MENU_PATH=#{menuPath}, MLEVEL=#{mlevel}, MNAME=#{mname}, URL=#{url}, DE_CODE=#{deCode}, MENU_SORT=#{menuSort}, SYS_MENU=#{sysMenu}, AVALIABLE=#{avaliable}, update_by = #{updateUser}, update_time=#{updateTime} where ID=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT ID, PARENT_ID, ICON_CLS, PIC_URL, MENU_PATH, MLEVEL, MNAME, URL, DE_CODE, MENU_SORT, SYS_MENU, AVALIABLE, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DELETE_MARK FROM ts_menu where delete_mark=0
mapper.select: select ID, PARENT_ID, ICON_CLS, PIC_URL, MENU_PATH, MLEVEL, MNAME, URL, DE_CODE, MENU_SORT, SYS_MENU, AVALIABLE, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DELETE_MARK from ts_menu where ID=#{id}
